GSP30vijnbhau:3: adyāpi na nivṛtto me saṃśayaḥ parameśvara /
GSP30vijnbhau:8: cakrārūḍham anackaṃ vā kiṃ vā śaktisvarūpakam // 4 //
GSP30vijnbhau:9: parāparāyāḥ sakalam aparāyāś ca vā punaḥ /
GSP30vijnbhau:10: parāyā yadi tadvat syāt paratvaṃ tad virudhyate // 5 //
GSP30vijnbhau:11: na hi varṇavibhedena dehabhedena vā bhavet /
GSP30vijnbhau:12: paratvaṃ niṣkalatvena sakalatve na tad bhavet // 6 //
GSP30vijnbhau:13: prasādaṃ kuru me nātha niḥśeṣaṃ chinddhi saṃśayam /
GSP30vijnbhau:15: sādhu sādhu tvayā pṛṣṭaṃ tantrasāram idam priye // 7 //
GSP30vijnbhau:22: tattvato na navātmāsau śabdarāśir na bhairavaḥ /
GSP30vijnbhau:23: na cāsau triśirā devo na ca śaktitrayātmakaḥ // 11 //
GSP30vijnbhau:32: tad vapus tattvato jñeyaṃ vimalaṃ viśvapūraṇam /
GSP30vijnbhau:33: evaṃvidhe pare tattve kaḥ pūjyaḥ kaś ca tṛpyati // 16 //
GSP30vijnbhau:35: sā parā pararūpeṇa parā devī prakīrtitā // 17 //
GSP30vijnbhau:38: na vahner dāhikā śaktir vyatiriktā vibhāvyate /
GSP30vijnbhau:41: tadāsau śivarūpī syāt śaivī mukham ihocyate // 20 //
GSP30vijnbhau:43: jñāyate digvibhāgādi tadvac chaktyā śivaḥ priye // 21 //
GSP30vijnbhau:48: kair upāyair mukhaṃ tasya parā devi katham bhavet /
GSP30vijnbhau:49: yathā samyag ahaṃ vedmi tathā me brūhi bhairava // 23 //
GSP30vijnbhau:51: ūrdhve prāṇo hy adho jīvo visargātmā paroccaret /
GSP30vijnbhau:55: na vrajen na viśec chaktir marudrūpā vikāsite /
GSP30vijnbhau:57: kumbhitā recitā vāpi pūritā vā yadā bhavet /
GSP30vijnbhau:62: ūrdhvaṃ muṣṭitrayaṃ yāvat tāvad ante mahodayaḥ // 29 //
GSP30vijnbhau:70: śūnye kuḍye pare pātre svayaṃ līnā varapradā // 33 //
GSP30vijnbhau:72: krameṇa manaso dārḍhyāt lakṣayet laṣyam uttamam // 34 //
GSP30vijnbhau:76: dṛṣṭe bindau kramāl līne tanmadhye paramā sthitiḥ // 36 //
GSP30vijnbhau:78: binduṃ śikhānte hṛdaye layānte dhyāyato layaḥ // 37 //
GSP30vijnbhau:82: śūnyayā parayā śaktyā śūnyatām eti bhairavi // 39 //
GSP30vijnbhau:91: pṛṣṭaśūnyaṃ mūlaśūnyaṃ yugapad bhāvayec ca yaḥ /
GSP30vijnbhau:98: vibhāvayet tatas tasya bhāvanā sā sthirā bhavet // 47 //
GSP30vijnbhau:100: na kiṃcid antare tasya dhyāyann adhyeyabhāg bhavet // 48 //
GSP30vijnbhau:105: yathā tathā yatra tatra dvādaśānte manaḥ kṣipet //
GSP30vijnbhau:108: pluṣṭam vicintayed ante śāntābhāsas tadā bhavet // 52 //
GSP30vijnbhau:109: evam eva jagat sarvaṃ dagdhaṃ dhyātvā vikalpataḥ /
GSP30vijnbhau:112: tattvāni yāni nilayaṃ dhyātvānte vyajyate parā // 54 //
GSP30vijnbhau:113: pināṃ ca durbalāṃ śaktiṃ dhyātvā dvādaśagocare /
GSP30vijnbhau:114: praviśya hṛdaye dhyāyan muktaḥ svātantryam āpnuyāt // 55 //
GSP30vijnbhau:120: tatraiva ca mano līnaṃ tatas tallayabhājanam // 58 //
GSP30vijnbhau:122: tallayaṃ tatkṣaṇād gatvā tallayāt tanmayo bhavet // 59 //
GSP30vijnbhau:125: ubhayor bhāvayor jñāne dhyātvā madhyaṃ samāśrayet /
GSP30vijnbhau:126: yugapac ca dvayaṃ tyaktvā madhye tattvam prakāśate // 61 //
GSP30vijnbhau:127: bhāve tyakte niruddhā cin naiva bhāvāntaraṃ vrajet /
GSP30vijnbhau:129: sarvaṃ dehaṃ cinmayaṃ hi jagad vā paribhāvayet /
GSP30vijnbhau:131: vāyudvayasya saṃghaṭṭād antar vā bahir antataḥ /
GSP30vijnbhau:133: sarvaṃ jagat svadehaṃ vā svānandabharitaṃ smaret /
GSP30vijnbhau:139: vahner viṣasya madhye tu cittaṃ sukhamayaṃ kṣipet /
GSP30vijnbhau:142: yat sukham brahmatattvasya tat sukhaṃ svākyam ucyate // 69 //
GSP30vijnbhau:145: ānande mahati prāpte dṛṣṭe vā bāndhave cirāt /
GSP30vijnbhau:146: ānandam udgataṃ dhyātvā tallayas tanmanā bhavet // 71 //
GSP30vijnbhau:151: yatra yatra manas tuṣṭir manas tatraiva dhārayet /
GSP30vijnbhau:154: sāvasthā manasā gamyā parā devī prakāśate // 75 //
GSP30vijnbhau:160: nidhāya tatprasaṅgena parā pūrṇā matir bhavet // 78 //
GSP30vijnbhau:162: kakṣavyomni manaḥ kurvan śamam āyāti tallayāt // 79 //
GSP30vijnbhau:163: sthūlarūpasya bhāvasya stabdhāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ nipātya ca /
GSP30vijnbhau:164: acireṇa nirādhāraṃ manaḥ kṛtvā śivaṃ vrajet // 80 //
GSP30vijnbhau:166: hoccāraṃ manasā kurvaṃs tataḥ śānte pralīyate // 81 //
GSP30vijnbhau:168: svadehaṃ manasi kṣiṇe kṣaṇāt kṣīṇāśayo bhavet // 82 //
GSP30vijnbhau:170: praśānte mānase bhāve devi divyaugham āpnuyāt // 83 //
GSP30vijnbhau:171: ākāśaṃ vimalam paśyan kṛtvā dṛṣṭiṃ nirantarām /
GSP30vijnbhau:172: stabdhātmā tatkṣaṇād devi bhairavaṃ vapur āpnuyāt // 84 //
GSP30vijnbhau:173: līnaṃ mūrdhni viyat sarvam bhairavatvena bhāvayet /
GSP30vijnbhau:175: kiñcij jñātaṃ dvaitadāyi bāhyālokas tamaḥ punaḥ /
GSP30vijnbhau:178: taimiram bhāvayan rūpam bhairavaṃ rūpam eṣyati // 87 //
GSP30vijnbhau:179: evam eva nimīlyādau netre kṛṣṇābham agrataḥ /
GSP30vijnbhau:180: prasārya bhairavaṃ rūpam bhāvayaṃs tanmayo bhavet // 88 //
GSP30vijnbhau:183: abindum avisargaṃ ca akāraṃ japato mahān /
GSP30vijnbhau:187: vyomākāraṃ svam ātmānaṃ dhyāyed digbhir anāvṛtam /
GSP30vijnbhau:188: nirāśrayā citiḥ śaktiḥ svarūpaṃ darśayet tadā // 92 //
GSP30vijnbhau:190: tatraiva cetanāṃ yuktvā bhairave nirmalā gatiḥ // 93 //
GSP30vijnbhau:193: māyā vimohinī nāma kalāyāḥ kalanaṃ sthitam /
GSP30vijnbhau:194: ityādidharmaṃ tattvānāṃ kalayan na pṛthag bhavet // 95 //
GSP30vijnbhau:196: yata eva samudbhūtā tatas tatraiva līyate // 96 //
GSP30vijnbhau:197: yadā mamecchā notpannā jñānaṃ vā kas tadāsmi vai /
GSP30vijnbhau:199: icchāyām athavā jñāne jāte cittaṃ niveśayet /
GSP30vijnbhau:202: tattvataḥ kasyacin naitad evambhāvī śivaḥ priye // 99 //
GSP30vijnbhau:204: ataś ca tanmayaṃ sarvam bhāvayan bhavajij janaḥ // 100 //
GSP30vijnbhau:206: buddhiṃ nistimitāṃ kṛtvā tat tattvam avaśiṣyate // 101 //
GSP30vijnbhau:208: bhramad vā dhyāyataḥ sarvam paśyataś ca sukhodgamaḥ // 102 //
GSP30vijnbhau:209: na cittaṃ nikṣiped duḥkhe na sukhe vā parikṣipet /
GSP30vijnbhau:210: bhairavi jñāyatāṃ madhye kiṃ tattvam avaśiṣyate // 103 //
GSP30vijnbhau:212: dṛḍhena manasā dṛṣṭyā nānyekṣiṇyā sukhī bhavet // 104 //
GSP30vijnbhau:213: ghaṭādau yac ca vijñānam icchādyaṃ vā mamāntare /
GSP30vijnbhau:214: naiva sarvagataṃ jātam bhāvayan iti sarvagaḥ // 105 //
GSP30vijnbhau:218: apekṣāṃ svaśarīrasya tyaktvā vyāpī dinair bhavet // 107 //
GSP30vijnbhau:219: nirādhāraṃ manaḥ kṛtvā vikalpān na vikalpayet /
GSP30vijnbhau:222: sa evāhaṃ śaivadharmā iti dārḍhyāc chivo bhavet // 109 //
GSP30vijnbhau:225: bhrāntvā bhrāntvā śarīreṇa tvaritam bhuvi pātanāt /
GSP30vijnbhau:229: sampradāyam imam devi śṛṇu samyag vadāmy aham /
GSP30vijnbhau:231: saṃkocaṃ karṇayoḥ kṛtvā hy adhodvāre tathaiva ca /
GSP30vijnbhau:232: anackam ahalaṃ dhyāyan viśed brahma sanātanam // 114 //
GSP30vijnbhau:235: yatra yatra mano yāti bāhye vābhyantare 'pi vā /
GSP30vijnbhau:236: tatra tatra śivāvāsthā vyāpakatvāt kva yāsyati // 116 //
GSP30vijnbhau:239: kṣutādyante bhaye śoke gahvare vā raṇād drute /
GSP30vijnbhau:241: vastuṣu smaryamāṇeṣu dṛṣṭe deśe manas tyajet /
GSP30vijnbhau:243: kvacid vastuni vinyasya śanair dṛṣṭiṃ nivartayet /
GSP30vijnbhau:244: taj jñānaṃ cittasahitaṃ devi śūnyālāyo bhavet //120 //
GSP30vijnbhau:246: sā śaktiḥ śāṅkarī nityam bhavayet tāṃ tataḥ śivaḥ // 121 //
GSP30vijnbhau:248: tām eva manasā dhyātvā vidito 'pi praśāmyati // 122 //
GSP30vijnbhau:249: kiṃcijjñair yā smṛtā śuddhiḥ sā śuddhiḥ śambhudarśane /
GSP30vijnbhau:250: na śucir hy aśucis tasmān nirvikalpaḥ sukhī bhavet // 123 //
GSP30vijnbhau:251: sarvatra bhairavo bhāvaḥ sāmānyeṣv api gocaraḥ /
GSP30vijnbhau:252: na ca tadvyatirekteṇa paro 'stīty advayā gatiḥ // 124 //
GSP30vijnbhau:253: samaḥ śatrau ca mitre ca samo mānāvamānayoḥ //
GSP30vijnbhau:254: brahmaṇaḥ paripūrṇatvāt iti jñātvā sukhī bhavet // 125 //
GSP30vijnbhau:255: na dveṣam bhāvayet kvāpi na rāgam bhāvayet kvacit /
GSP30vijnbhau:257: yad avedyaṃ yad agrāhyaṃ yac chūnyaṃ yad abhāvagam /
GSP30vijnbhau:258: tat sarvam bhairavam bhāvyaṃ tadante bodhasambhavaḥ // 127 //
GSP30vijnbhau:261: yatra yatra mano yāti tat tat tenaiva tatkṣaṇam /
GSP30vijnbhau:270: kiṃ tattvam indrajālasya iti dārḍhyāc chamaṃ vrajet // 133 //
GSP30vijnbhau:271: ātmano nirvikārasya kva jñānaṃ kva ca vā kriyā /
GSP30vijnbhau:272: jñānāyattā bahirbhāvā ataḥ śūnyam idaṃ jagat // 134 //
GSP30vijnbhau:273: na me bandho na mokṣo me bhītasyaitā vibhīṣikāḥ /
GSP30vijnbhau:274: pratibimbam idam buddher jaleṣv iva vivasvataḥ // 135 //
GSP30vijnbhau:279: mānasaṃ cetanā śaktir ātmā ceti catuṣṭayam /
GSP30vijnbhau:280: yadā priye parikṣīṇaṃ tadā tad bhairavaṃ vapuḥ // 138 //
GSP30vijnbhau:282: dvādaśābhyadhikaṃ devi yaj jñātvā jñānavij janaḥ // 139 //
GSP30vijnbhau:283: atra caikatame yukto jāyate bhairavaḥ svayam /
GSP30vijnbhau:287: jīvann api vimukto 'sau kurvann api na lipyate /
GSP30vijnbhau:289: idaṃ yadi vapur deva parāyāś ca maheśvara // 142 //
GSP30vijnbhau:290: evamuktavyavasthāyāṃ japyate ko japaś ca kaḥ /
GSP30vijnbhau:291: dhyāyate ko mahānātha pūjyate kaś ca tṛpyati // 143 //
GSP30vijnbhau:292: hūyate kasya vā homo yāgaḥ kasya ca kiṃ katham /
GSP30vijnbhau:294: eṣātra prakriyā bāhyā sthūleṣv eva mṛgekṣaṇe // 144 //
GSP30vijnbhau:295: bhūyo bhūyaḥ pare bhāve bhāvanā bhāvyate hi yā /
GSP30vijnbhau:296: japaḥ so 'tra svayaṃ nādo mantrātmā japya īdṛśaḥ // 145 //
GSP30vijnbhau:297: dhyānaṃ hi niścalā buddhir nirākārā nirāśrayā /
GSP30vijnbhau:299: pūjā nāma na puṣpādyair yā matiḥ kriyate dṛḍhā /
GSP30vijnbhau:300: nirvikalpe mahāvyomni sā pūjā hy ādarāl layaḥ // 147 //
GSP30vijnbhau:304: hūyate manasā sārdhaṃ sa homaś cetanāsrucā // 149 //
GSP30vijnbhau:308: anyathā tasya tattvasya kā pūjā kāś ca tṛpyati // 151 //
GSP30vijnbhau:311: yair eva pūjyate dravyais tarpyate vā parāparaḥ /
GSP30vijnbhau:312: yaś caiva pūjakaḥ sarvaḥ sa evaikaḥ kva pūjanam // 153 //
GSP30vijnbhau:313: vrajet prāṇo viśej jīva icchayā kuṭilākṛtiḥ /
GSP30vijnbhau:316: tayā devyā samāviṣṭaḥ param bhairavam āpnuyāt // 155 //
GSP30vijnbhau:318: japo devyāḥ samuddiṣṭaḥ sulabho durlabho jaḍaiḥ // 156 //
GSP30vijnbhau:319: ity etat kathitaṃ devi paramāmṛtam uttamam /
GSP30vijnbhau:320: etac ca naiva kasyāpi prakāśyaṃ tu kadācana // 157 //
GSP30vijnbhau:325: sarvam etat parityajya grāhyam etan mṛgekṣaṇe /
GSP30vijnbhau:326: kim ebhir asthirair devi sthiram param idaṃ dhanam /
GSP30vijnbhau:327: prāṇā api pradātavyā na deyaṃ paramāmṛtam // 160 //
GSP30vijnbhau:332: ity uktvānanditā devi ka.ṅthe lagnā śivasya tu // 162 //
